name: 宝宝认知巴士早教免费游戏 － 儿童识字名犬乐园
name_original: 宝宝认知巴士早教免费游戏 － 儿童识字名犬乐园
description:
This is a part of a series of Chinese studying tools aimed at learning the words about the sea animals, we have not specifically translated it into other languages, just wish you learn Chinese in the real Chinese environment , to learn any language , the most important is to look himself as a child,As we know, the child is
a genius while learning language.

If you wish your children to learn Chinese, this software is also an excellent choice,for it is used teach kids in China too, wish you and your family successful in learning Chinese.
